channel.title: Joanna Hogg on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Joanna Hogg on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Tilda Swinton – Ongoing’: Amsterdam Eye Exhibition Gets Colorful Teaser (Exclusive)
item.description: The exhibition showcases new and existing works by such collaborators and friends as Pedro Almodóvar, Luca Guadagnino, Joanna Hogg, Derek Jarman, Jim Jarmusch, and Apichatpong Weerasethakul.
